來這裡是因為我累了，在尋找台灣精釀啤酒時誤將其誤認為是啤酒爸爸。

雖然這是我的錯誤，但我很高興偶然發現了這個真正的寶石地點！  工作人員非常酷，當我在開業時出現時，他們有很多時間與我聊天，因為我是一個只會說英語的人。

我和“E”交談得很愉快，我了解了他的故事和酒吧的歷史。  喝了一些好酒，尤其是“哈利先生”，它是燒酒、烏龍茶、白葡萄酒、梅酒和桃子的美妙組合。  它非常好吃……甚至我的妻子（她不是一個狂熱的酒精愛好者）也非常喜歡它。  您需要弄清楚如何生產更多並運送出去！

美好的時光。會再訪！
EN:
Here is because I am tired. When I was looking for Taiwan craft beer, I mistakenly believed that it was a beer father.

Although this is my mistake, I am glad to discover this real gemstone place by chance!The staff is very cool. When I appeared, they had a lot of time to chat with me because I was a person who only spoke English.

I talked with "E" very well, and I learned about his story and the history of the bar.I drank some good wine, especially "Mr. Harry", which is a wonderful combination of shochu, oolong tea, white wine, plum wine and peach.It is very delicious ... and even my wife (she is not a fanatical alcohol enthusiast) also likes it very much.You need to figure out how to produce more and transport it!

Beautiful time.Will visit again!
